description: Update an existing project project cost classification.
permissions: User must be authorized for the related project; permissions are delegated to the Project policy.
side_effects: Updates the project project cost classification and touches related project phase cost items.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (project project cost classification ID). At least one updatable field must be provided; otherwise the command errors.

flags.name: --name-override
flags.description: Override the classification name for this project
